item.title: cash register
item.description: This is the money you have to buy fish.

item.title: fishbowl
item.description: This shows the number of fish that you own. You have _stockamount fish at the moment, with a total market value of $_stockvalue.

item.title: stock
item.description: These are the fish that you have.

item.title: grayed out fish
item.description: You have sold all of your stock of this fish.

item.title: fish
item.description: This is a fish that you have for sale. Move it onto the matching picture in a trader's 'Wanted' area to sell it.

item.title: history
item.description: Select 'H' to review your transaction history for this breed of fish.

item.title: status bar
item.description: Your current trading status is: _statusvalue out of 100

item.title: history final
item.description: Select 'H' to review your entire transaction history

item.title: market icon
item.description: This is a market. Select to open it.

item.title: market title
item.description: This is the name of this market.

item.title: trader
item.description: This is a trader. Select the trader to view their personal profile.

item.title: fish for sale
item.description: This fish is for sale. Move it to your stock bar to buy it.

item.title: fish wanted
item.description: The trader wants to buy this fish. If you have this fish to sell, move it here.

item.title: close button
item.description: not used

item.title: market feedback
item.description: These are comments about the trader from other traders in the market.

item.title: reasons for buying
item.description: These comments explain why this trader wants to buy.

item.title: reasons for selling
item.description: These comments explain why this trader wants to sell.

item.title: history: location
item.description: not used

item.title: history: amount
item.description: not used

item.title: history: at market - buy
item.description: not used

item.title: history: above market - buy
item.description: not used

item.title: history: below market - buy
item.description: not used

item.title: history at market - sell
item.description: not used

item.title: history above market - sell
item.description: not used

item.title: history below market - sell
item.description: not used

item.title: finish game button
item.description: not used
